events.message: test: P2SH sig ops are only counted with `SCRIPT_VERIFY_P2SH` flag

comments.body:
we're not ignoring, we're not setting it
```suggestion
        // P2SH sigops are not counted if we don't set the SCRIPT_VERIFY_P2SH flag
```
